fields.reasoning:
After invalid input, the field received a red border and an error class, but no descriptive error message, `aria-invalid`, or programmatic association was provided. Since the error is indicated only through color, this fails WCAG 1.4.1.

fields.identification: Tenho 13 anos ou mais de idade e concordo com os termos do Acordo de Subscrição Steam e da Política de Privacidade da Valve. (checkbox)

fields.reasoning: For both the email fields, after invalid input, a red border was applied, and an error class was added. However, there was no programmatic support (aria-invalid, aria-describedby) or visible error messages linked to the fields. Since the error indication relies solely on color without textual support, this fails WCAG 1.4.1.
